categories: Category:Battles of the Jedi Civil War

nodes.text: Battle of Mon Gazza  (Jedi Civil War)

The Battle of Mon Gazza was a battle of the Jedi Civil War, a conflict between the Galactic Republic and Darth Revan's Sith Empire. Sometime following the Republic victory at Rodia, a campaign was launched against the Sith Empire. From Rodia, Republic forces defeated the Sith at Mon Gazza before advancing through Ando, Manda, and Bothawui, ultimately culminating at a battle at Lannik.

The Battle of Mon Gazza makes its only appearance in The Essential Atlas. An exact date is not provided for the battle, and it only illustrates the battle on the galactic map rather than in prose. The battle is shown as part of a Republic campaign that began at Rodia and ended at Lannik.
